jdbcService.sql: update node_attachment_thumbnail set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), thumbnail_type_id = case when :thumbnailTypeId is null then thumbnail_type_id else :thumbnailTypeId end, uri = case when :uri is null then uri else :uri end, size = case when :size is null then size else :size end, content_type = case when :contentType is null then content_type else :contentType end, node_attachment_id = case when :nodeAttachmentId is null then node_attachment_id else :nodeAttachmentId end where id = :id
